titles.title: Private Eye Dol
プライベート・アイ・ドル
Private Eye Doll
Private eye dol

anime.description: * Concurrent with an ADV game by HuneX/NEC-HE, the title is a pun about its detective and idol protagonist. It was released on issues 1 to 3 of NEC`s Anime Freak FX, a CD-ROM magazine resembling a game for the PC-FX platform. The hacker Idol King is targeting idols, exposing awkward scenes of their private lives. Now, the next is the popular May Star... Note: The three episodes were later compiled in a CD-ROM, Private Eye Dol in Windows95, featuring screensavers and wallpapers as extra contents.

externalentity.identifier: プライベート・アイ・ドル

tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
